dcterms:creator: I. Chalkidis
I. Androutsopoulos
dcterms:description: This subset contains the contract headers of the contracts of Chalkidis et al., where the goal is to identify contract titles, parties, start dates, and effective dates.
dcterms:title: Contract Header / Preamble

dcterms:creator: I. Chalkidis
I. Androutsopoulos
dcterms:description: This subset contains the sections of the contracts of Chalkidis et al. where the governing law and jurisdiction elements need to be identified.
dcterms:title: Applicable Law

dcterms:creator: I. Chalkidis
I. Androutsopoulos
A. Michos
dcterms:description: This dataset contains sections from lease agreements with various elements such as address, landlord, tenant, start date, effective date, end date, term of the lease, and agreed rent amount.
dcterms:title: Lease Particulars

dcterms:creator: I. Chalkidis
I. Androutsopoulos
A. Michos
dcterms:description: Domain-specific WORD2VEC embeddings pre-trained on approximately 750k contracts.
dcterms:title: WORD2VEC embeddings (domain-specific)

dcterms:creator: Ilias Chalkidis
Manos Fergadiotis
Prodromos Malakasiotis
Nikolaos Aletras

dcterms:description: LEGAL-BERT is a BERT model pre-trained on legal corpora, designed to improve performance in legal document tasks.
dcterms:title: LEGALBERT
